nodes.text: The Mennaalii system was a system in the Colonies, and contained the planet Mrlsst. It centered around the star Mennaalii. It was in the Freeworlds Territory of the Tapani sector, on the Shapani Bypass.

While passing through this system to avoid navigating through an asteroid field, a Rebel convoy consisting of two BFF-1 bulk freighters designated Xroi and three CR90 corvettes designated Quluiy was attacked by pirates. An Imperial responsive force soon followed, attemping to rout both factions before they could escape. However, Rebel starfighters managed to drive the pirates and Imperials away without losing any craft in the convoy.
